alert.note: Alert for Fortymile Country; Upper Tanana Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 10:10PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Another Winter Storm Saturday Night and Sunday... A weather system in the Gulf of Alaska will move over the Southeast Interior Saturday evening and continue into Sunday. This will bring 2 to 4 inches of snow to most of the Southeast Interior, including Fairbanks, from Saturday evening into Sunday evening. In Fairbanks the heaviest snow is expected from late Saturday night through Sunday afternoon. Areas south and east of Delta Junction could see precipitation start as rain Saturday afternoon, with a chance of freezing rain Saturday evening before it changes to all snow late Saturday night. The Alaska Highway from Dot Lake to Tok could see heavier snow Saturday evening but amounts are uncertain at this time.
